channel.title: Worst Player Ever
channel.description: The worst kind of person on these forums is someone who steals anothers work and doesnt even change it just the name ex:Admin platebody -to- Galkons platebody etc. That is horrible and should not be committed by anyone and galkonspride has done this with many items from the Icerealm client and I do not appreciate that. I also think the worst part is that if you talk to him about it he denies it and covers it up with lies. These types of people *leechers* should get off of the forums or change the way they act and stop being so snotty. If you cannot come to terms with these sad facts of our world you should never have tried this in the first place. Thank you.

item.description:
@Call_of_Duty wrote:

[quote=“zoltanman, post:28, topic:196398”]She’s leeching their work right now, she’s calling it a silabsoft client when it’s jagex. All of it is jagex’s work, she’s just streaming the data and models to her client.[/quote]Isn’t she improving it? She’s improving the 317 client. If not, I loose >_<.

item.description:
@Call_of_Duty wrote:

[quote=“zoltanman, post:26, topic:196398”]Eh, we all leech. We all use wL’s source and don’t give him credit.[/quote]I do actually :P. I didn’t before, but I do now.

[quote=“Vert, post:25, topic:196398”]We are all Leechers, leeching Jagex work[/quote]Yeah, and no one ever credits JaGeX, that’s what makes me mad. Leeching is stealing work then taking it as yours, without improving, so technically, we aren’t? At least Silabsoft isn’t.

The worst kind of person on these forums is someone who steals anothers work and doesnt even change it just the name ex:Admin platebody -to- Galkons platebody etc. That is horrible and should not be committed by anyone and galkonspride has done this with many items from the Icerealm client and I do not appreciate that. I also think the worst part is that if you talk to him about it he denies it and covers it up with lies. These types of people leechers should get off of the forums or change the way they act and stop being so snotty. If you cannot come to terms with these sad facts of our world you should never have tried this in the first place. Thank you.
